cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Expression of Interest and Prequalification process for 3 no. Design and Build social housing projects for Donegal County Council.
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Donegal County Council seeks expressions of interest which will be pre-qualified for a restricted competition for the Design and Build of 3 no. social housing projects at Barrack Hill Carndonagh (21), Radharc na Tra Breige Malin (9) and Carn Road Gleneely (10), all of which are located within the Inishowen Municipal District, County Donegal.

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Lot 1 Radharc na Trá Bréige Malin, (Type 2 Project)
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: Donegal County Council seeks expressions of interest which will be pre-qualified for a restricted competition for the Design and Build of 3 no. social housing projects at Barrack Hill Carndonagh (21), Radharc na Tra Breige Malin (9) and Carn Road Gleneely (10), all of which are located within the Inishowen Municipal District, County Donegal.
